ej,pinem001,P,davig901,Doctored ball (Pine tar) $after the third pitch to Grady Sizemore, Red Sox manager John Farrell asked HP umpire Gerry Davis to check Yankees pitcher Michael Pineda for a foreign substance; Davis checked Pineda's glove and hands; then Davis saw a mark on Pineda's neck that turned out to be pine tar; Pineda ejected by Davis
